errors.error_description: Specifies support for Python 2.7 which is deprecated and incompatible with modern dependencies
correction_candidates: Change to Python 3.8+ as the minimum requirement
Specify only Python 3.6+ without mentioning Python 2.7
Update to require Python 3.9+ for better compatibility
Change to Python 3.7+ as the minimum supported version
errors.golden_answer: Specify only Python 3.6+ without mentioning Python 2.7

errors.error_description: Specifies outdated dependency versions that may have security vulnerabilities or compatibility issues
correction_candidates: Remove version pinning and use pip install rdflib sparqlwrapper owlrl for latest versions
Update to more recent versions like rdflib>=6.0.0 sparqlwrapper>=2.0.0 owlrl>=6.0.0
Use pip install -r requirements.txt and maintain versions in a separate file
Specify minimum versions with >= instead of exact versions with ==
errors.golden_answer: Remove version pinning and use pip install rdflib sparqlwrapper owlrl for latest versions
